## âœ… Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have removed any debugging code or console logs

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added/updated docstrings for new/modified functions
- [ ] I have updated the API documentation (if applicable)

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have checked my code and corrected any misspellings

### Dependencies
- [ ] I have updated requirements.txt (if dependencies changed)
- [ ] I have verified compatibility with existing dependencies
- [ ] I have documented any new environment variables

### Security
- [ ] I have reviewed my code for security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have not introduced any hardcoded secrets or credentials
- [ ] I have followed security best practices
